name: bullet kill you
description:
Windows build recommended for a better experience and performance

Made for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022!

Kill enemies and dodge bullets in this action packed, minimalistic game!

HOW TO PLAY:
  • Use mouse to aim and left click to shoot.
  • Move with WASD
  • Defeat the enemy to win - all separate bodies are part of one central enemy
  • Don't get hit! Losing all your lives (displayed behind everything) will mean you lose!
SOCIAL LINKS:

Discord Server
